title: 5 New Nova Launcher Tips & Tricks (2017!)
description: Ok, so Ive done a video on Nova launcher tips and tricks before (  But since then, nova launcher has released new features. So, I decided to make an updated video for you guys. Enjoy!  [Video content]  1. Quickly find Your apps 2. Get App Shortcuts Like the Pixel 3. Add a Google Now gesture to Nova Launcher 4. Use Gestures like a pro 5. See images with the dynamic badges  [Links]  Nova launcher beta    Icon pack DARKMATTER VINTAGE - ICON PACK   Q&A this Saturday!      You can reach me here  Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -   Which background music did I use? Wave from Joakim Karud  (I didn't miss it this time :p)  What camera do I use?  Canon 70D  What mike do I use? Blue Yeti and Video Mic pro (depends on requirement)  What tripod do I use? Manfrotto MVKBFR  What video editor do I use? Final Cut Pro  My computer do I use? iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
